definition: Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons
pinyin: Bu4 Kuo4 san4 He2 wu3 qi4 Tiao2 yue1
Bei3 jing1 he2 wu3 qi4 yan2 jiu1 suo3
qian1 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4
bai3 wan4 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4
jin4 zhi3 he2 wu3 qi4 shi4 yan4 tiao2 yue1
fei1 he2 wu3 qi4 guo2 jia1

sentences.english: And maybe they continue to improve their arsenals.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們會繼續改進其核武庫。

sentences.english: Then consider how Pakistan is rapidly expanding its arsenal of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 再想想巴基斯坦是如何快速擴張它的核武器兵工廠的。

sentences.english: But I suspect that the nuclearweapon is only the scapegoat for our fears.
sentences.chinese: 但我懷疑，核武器不過是我們害怕的替罪羊。

sentences.english: So we're confident that the North Koreans do, in fact, have a program to enrich uranium to produce nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們確知北韓有製造核武器的濃縮鈾項目。

sentences.english: Developing a nuclear capability was one means of redressing this imbalance.
sentences.chinese: 發展核武器是消除這種不平衡的途徑之一。

sentences.english: China has all along supported and advocated complete prohibition and thorough destruction of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 中國一貫主張並積極倡導全面禁止和徹底銷燬核武器。

sentences.english: North Korea has for years relied on its nuclear build-up to squeeze aid from its neighbors and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 北韓多年來靠本國的核武庫向鄰國及美國榨取援助。

sentences.english: India and the United States share a vision of a world free of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 印度和美國共同憧憬一個沒有核武器的未來世界。

sentences.english: Chinese Government undertakes non-use of nuclear weapons against non-nuclear countries .
sentences.chinese: 中國政府承諾不對無核國家使用核武器。

sentences.english: The nuclear weapons are targeted on Western Europe.
sentences.chinese: 這些核武器對準了西歐。

sentences.english: Prohibiting deployment and stationing of nuclear weapons on their national territories.
sentences.chinese: 禁止在其國土上部署和存放核武器。

sentences.english: Hxdying nuclear weapons would put Iran in a much securer position.
sentences.chinese: 擁有核武器將使伊朗處於一個更爲安全的境地。

sentences.english: They could not accept the fact that “black” people should—or could—possess them.
sentences.chinese: 他們無法接受黑種人應該或能夠擁有核武器這一事實。

sentences.english: Anytime, China can't use the nuke nohow first.
sentences.chinese: 在任何時候，中國絕不會首先使用核武器。

sentences.english: Each also served as protective patron for many non-nuclear nations.
sentences.chinese: 它們還各自充當許多無核武器國家的保護國。

sentences.english: It is for the same reason that atomic weapons are preferably called "nuclear weapons".
sentences.chinese: 由於同樣原因，把原子武器稱作核武器會更合適些。

pinyin: da4 gui1 mo2 sha1 shang1 xing4 wu3 qi4
